summary: This document is a timeline of discussions between Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorneys and prosecutors from the Southern District of New York (SDNY) during 2019 and 2020. It lists dates and participants for meetings, phone calls, and emails, indicating ongoing pre-trial negotiations and communications.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the case for whom the attorneys are working; Ghislaine Maxwell is the accused.

persons.name: Pagliuca
persons.context: An SDNY prosecutor involved in discussions with Maxwell's defense team.

persons.name: Everdell
persons.context: A defense attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, frequently in contact with SDNY prosecutors.

persons.name: Cohen
persons.context: A defense attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, participating in meetings with SDNY prosecutors.

events.description: Maxwell's attorneys begin discussions with SDNY prosecutors.

events.title: Meeting at SDNY Offices
events.description: Cohen and Everdell meet with SDNY prosecutors at their offices.

events.title: Follow-up Meeting
events.description: Cohen and Everdell meet again with SDNY prosecutors.

events.title: Continued Communications
events.description: Ongoing emails and meetings between defense and prosecution through 2020.

keyFacts: Maxwell's defense team, including attorneys Everdell and Cohen, were in regular contact with SDNY prosecutors from at least July 2019 through 2020.
Multiple in-person meetings took place at SDNY offices, indicating substantive pre-trial negotiations.
Prosecutor Pagliuca is specifically named as a participant in these discussions alongside other SDNY prosecutors.
The timeline shows a pattern of communication including meetings, phone calls, and emails over more than a year.
